lines: Tesla announced a 12% reduction in its workforce, affecting over 7,000 employees

slide1.headline: Facebook Faces New Regulations
slide1.subtitle: A New Era for Social Media Oversight

lines: Facebook faces new regulations from governments around the world, with a potential 20% increase in compliance costs
The regulations aim to address concerns around data privacy, misinformation, and online safety, with a potential 25% increase in transparency
Facebook will be required to implement new measures to protect user data and prevent the spread of misinformation, with a potential 30% reduction in fake accounts
The regulations will also impact Facebook's advertising business, with a potential 15% reduction in revenue
